author: gumb00
content: Is this intended that `BALANCE` is not affected by delegation?

author: lightclient
content: i think so - since it doesn't have anything to do with code loading, it should always just return the balance of the requested address

author: gumb00
content: BALANCE of delegated address may produce result different from CALL into this address returning SELFBALANCE... I don't know if this can be an issue

author: lightclient
content: they should return the same value? SELFBALANCE would be executing in the context of the called address, not where the code lives

author: gumb00
content: oh I see, I missed that
